properties.name: Chinese restaurant Oshou
properties.description: Posted by Sindoh Cheap, good chinese restaurant. it\'s a kind of chain restaurant which is famous for young people, blue-collar. fried rice;400yen chaotzu;180yen tenshinhan(rice covered with fried egg);400yen

properties.name: Doutor(coffee shop)
properties.description: Posted by Sindoh  One of the biggest coffee chain in japan. You can drink thick & rich coffee. bagel is very nice. you should give it try. Starbucks coffee is weak but Doutor coffee is strong & rich. coffee ; 180yen epresso coffee ; 180yen coffee latte ;210yen teriyaki chiken bagel ; 260yen

properties.name: Hoteiya(revolving sushi restaurant)
properties.description: Posted by Sindoh Hoteiya is revolving sushi restaurant. 1 dish is about 100yen ~ 300yen. comparatively cheaper than normal sushi restaurant. you can check prices with colors of dishes.

properties.name: INDOYA(curry & rice raustrant)
properties.description: Posted by Sindohreally spicy curry & rice raustrant. you can change how hot curry is(normal & special & dynamite & extra-dynamite). curry & rice with beef; 840yen curry & rice with potato & onion; 735yen

properties.name: MOS BURGER(burger chain)
properties.description: Posted by SindohIt\'s japanese burger chain. a little bit expensive but they use organic vegetable. very good taste which is customized for japanese. MOS burger; 300yen MOS cheese burger; 330yen Teriyaki burger; 300yen

properties.name: Matsuya(Japanese fast food restaurant)
properties.description: Posted by Sindoh very popular for young people and foreigner. because it is incredibly cheap. they serve beef boul. you buy a chicket and show it to a waiter. beef boul;360yen pork boul;280yen curry & rice;280yen

properties.name: Mr.Donuts(Donuts chain)
properties.description: Posted by SindohJapanese donuts chain. There are many types of donuts. Coffee is 262yen but you can have another cup of coffee many times.

properties.name: Osaka castle
properties.description: Posted by SindohThis is the Osaka castle. It\'s a landmark of Osaka. It was built in 16 century. It\'s very big castle which has a elevator in. It takes about 1 hour to walk around it.

properties.name: Tramps(Bar)
properties.description: Posted by SindohSports, Music, Foriegn friends typical bar, it has a big screen which shows sport programs. Asahi Super Dry;500yen Gin&Tonic;600yen Old Crow;500yen

properties.name: Wendy's(burger chain)
properties.description: Posted by SindohThis is a franchisee of Wendy\'s International. you can order & eat like in your contry. Wendy\'s burger; 280yen Wendy\'s burger set; 560yen

properties.name: Yoshinoya(the Biggest beef boul fast food chain)
properties.description: Posted by Sindoh It is recognized the first chain for beef boul. very cheap & good taste. you can also take it out. beef boul(normal) ; 380yen beef boul(big) ; 480yen beef boul(special) ; 630yen
